hero.subtitle: Software Architect & Cloud Solutions Engineer
hero.description: Transform your business with scalable, cloud-native architectures designed for enterprise performance and reliability. 15+ years of building mission-critical systems for different industries.

about.title: Why Choose A89vg
about.lead: Expert software architecture and cloud solutions engineering that transforms your business vision into scalable, production-ready systems.
about.p1: With 15+ years building enterprise systems, from mobile field sales platforms to cloud-native microservices, I deliver solutions that power mission-critical applications. My experience spans .NET, Node.js, Python, and TypeScript across Azure and AWS, with deep expertise in microservices patterns, event-driven architectures, and domain-driven design.
about.p2: I've architected platforms serving enterprise clients, built microservices deployed across different regions, and led the construction of document processing systems. Every solution is built with clean architecture principles at its core.

highlights.problemSolverDesc: Passionate about finding elegant solutions to complex technical challenges
highlights.collaborativeDesc: Bridge technical and business teams with clear, effective communication
highlights.learnerDesc: Always exploring emerging technologies and best practices to deliver better solutions
highlights.detailDesc: Committed to writing clean, maintainable code with thorough testing and documentation

dotnet.title: .NET Architecture & Engineering
dotnet.desc: Enterprise-grade .NET architecture design and implementation. Specializing in clean architecture, CQRS patterns, event-driven systems, and microservices using the complete .NET ecosystem.

cloud.title: Cloud-Native Architecture
cloud.desc: Designing and implementing cloud-native solutions on AWS and Azure. Architecting serverless systems, containerized microservices, and scalable infrastructure using infrastructure-as-code principles.

modernization.title: .NET Modernization & Re-architecture
modernization.desc: Strategic re-architecting of legacy .NET Framework systems to modern cloud-native architectures. Complete architectural transformation including microservices decomposition and cloud migration.

leadership.title: Technical Leadership & Architecture Guidance
leadership.desc: Leading architecture decisions, mentoring engineering teams on best practices, and establishing architectural standards. Guiding teams through complex architectural challenges and technical strategy.

advisory.title: Architecture Consulting & Advisory
advisory.desc: Strategic architecture consulting, system design reviews, and technology selection. Expert guidance on architecture patterns, cloud platform selection, and scalability planning for enterprise systems.

devops.title: DevOps & Automation
devops.desc: CI/CD pipeline setup, automated testing, deployment strategies, and infrastructure as code with AWS CDK and CloudFormation.

consulting.title: Consulting Services
consulting.intro: Transform your development team and delivery practices
consulting.lead: I partner with engineering leaders to drive end-to-end improvements across people, process, and platform. Engagements are structured to stabilize delivery, standardize practices, and build capabilities your team owns.

environment.title: Technical Environment Organization
environment.desc: Repositories, branching, environments, and an Infrastructure-as-Code baseline.

process.title: Process Standardization
process.desc: SDLC definition, pull request policies, branching strategy, and coding conventions.

devops.title: DevOps Coordination
devops.desc: CI/CD pipelines, promotion workflows, and observability practices.

quality.title: Quality Improvement
quality.desc: Test strategy across the pyramid, quality gates in reviews, and defect triage.

automation.title: Automation Evaluation
automation.desc: Identify high-ROI automation, quick wins, and a prioritized backlog.

diagnosis.title: Diagnosis and Planning
diagnosis.desc: Discovery sessions, maturity assessment, prioritized roadmap, and risk alignment.

implementation.title: Implementation and Standardization
implementation.desc: Roll out core standards, pilot improvements, baseline CI/CD and testing, and establish delivery cadence.

consolidation.title: Consolidation and Transfer
consolidation.desc: Embed practices, finalize playbooks, train champions, and hand off with clear metrics.

notes.packages: Packages available: Tailored to your context. We will shape scope and cadence together.
notes.workMode: Work mode: Remote by default, with optional on-site sessions when valuable.

technologies.title: Technologies & Tools
technologies.intro: Comprehensive technology stack for building enterprise-grade solutions

contact.title: Start Your Project
contact.heading: Ready to transform your vision into reality?
contact.description: Let's discuss how A89vg can deliver the scalable architecture and cloud-native solutions your business needs. From greenfield projects to legacy modernization, every solution is architected for long-term success.
